title: The Beatles Movies 1-5
description:
All 5 of The Beatles movies A Hard Days Night(AVI), Help!(AVI), Magical Mystery Tour(AVI), Yellow Submarine(MP4) and Let It Be(AVI). I compiled This torrent a few years ago out of torrents I had download to get all of these movies and thought that it would be easier for people to get all of these videos in one torrent so this torrent was born and on Demonoid for a while but over the years it seems that Demonoid has shout down again (at least temporarily) So I guess I will move this torrent here.. Please leave many comments and or requests below I love to know how I am doing and I am sure others love to know the quality of a torrent before they decide whether they want to Download it or not... Please Seed!!!!
